Selected Key Findings from SMGL Phase 1 
  Maternal mortality fell sharply (by 
30%) in Uganda’s four SMGL-supported 
districts. (The equivalent population-
based maternal mortality ratios could 
not be calculated for SMGL-supported 
districts in Zambia.) Maternal mortality 
also declined by 35% in health facilities 
that implemented SMGL interventions 
in both Uganda and Zambia. These 
improvements are likely due to women’s 
increased access to
